solution_line_template: The driver travels ({first_duration_hours} hours * {first_speed_mph} mph) + ({second_speed_mph} mph * {second_duration_hours} hours) = <<({first_duration_hours}*{first_speed_mph})+({second_speed_mph}*{second_duration_hours})={miles_per_day}>>{miles_per_day} miles per day

From Monday to Saturday he travels in total {miles_per_day} miles/day * {delivery_days_per_week} days = <<{miles_per_day}*{delivery_days_per_week}={total_miles_per_week}>>{total_miles_per_week} miles in a week
